remarks: Line exchange property (compare ~ cvlatexch2 for atoms).  (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
llnexch.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
llnexch.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
llnexch.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
llnexch.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
llnexch.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
llnexch2N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. N /\ Y e. N /\ Z e. N ) /\ ( ( X ./\ Y ) e. A /\ X =/= Z ) ) -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) .<_ Z -> ( X ./\ Z ) .<_ Y ) ) $.
